name: 7 Sins
description: Installer for CD or ISO version over Wine.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Monte Cristo/7 Sins/THE7SINS_RETAIL.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Monte Cristo/7 Sins/
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
wine:
  WineDesktop: 1920x1080
